highlights: Worked on multiple front end repositories/code bases, implementing new features and fixing known bugs on customer facing websites and back office applications
Reworked our Smart Meter Booking Portal to improve user experience and improve conversion which increased by 75%.
Implemented authentication on our Solar Panel website to simplify quote journey for customers

Created a React Dashboard which connects to HP Siteflow API and allows users to view and manage printing devices. This was created to improve on searchability of devices since Siteflow's own dashboard takes a lot of time to navigate due to pagination and was championed by the IT team to manage 200+ devices
Wrote bash and Powershell scripts to automate tasks on Linux and Windows devices used within the Production line
